title: Dice Matching Game
description: Developed a dice game which incorporates random number generation, game logic for matching dice, and also captures score thus, increasing user interaction.

title: Calculator
description: Created a fully functional calculator which can handle basic arithmetic operations and includes features such as clear input field, deleting individual character and keyboard support.

title: Tic-Tac-Toe
description: Developed an interactive game, implementing logic for player turns, win detection, and game reset, thus, enhancing user experience.
